            <entry>cahi1:data_8f356826d3c344d6c770a78d7dc0a45b5190d0e5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Optical fibres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optische Fasern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fibres optiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fibras óticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fibre ottiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτικές ίνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fibras ópticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the path of a light beam in a thin optical fibre (top) and a cross-section of a fibre optic cable (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light beam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polyurethane sheath</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">total internal reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen den Pfad eines 
Lichtstrahls in einer dünnen optischen Faser (Oberseite) und des 
Querschnitts eines fiberoptischen Kabels (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent la voie d'accès d'un 
faisceau lumineux dans une fibre optique mince (dessus) et d'une 
section transversale d'un câble à fibres optiques (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram o trajeto de um feixe
luminoso em uma fibra ótica fina (alto) e de um cross-section de um 
cabo ótico da fibra (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano il percorso di un 
raggio di luce in una fibra ottica sottile (parte superiore) e di una 
sezione trasversale di un cavo ottico della fibra (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν το μονοπάτι μιας 
ελαφριάς ακτίνας σε μια λεπτή οπτική ίνα (κορυφή) και μια 
διατομή ενός οπτικού καλωδίου ινών (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran el camino de un rayo
de luz en una fibra óptica fina (tapa) y de una sección 
representativa de un cable óptico de la fibra (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtstrahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Faser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polyurethanhülle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interne totalreflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">faisceau lumineux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fibre optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gaine de polyuréthane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion interne totale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">feixe luminoso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fibra ótica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bainha do poliuretano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão interna total</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggio di luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fibra ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fodero del poliuretano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione interna totale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά ακτίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική ίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θήκη πολυουρεθάνιου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνολική εσωτερική αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rayo de luz</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fibra óptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión interna total</string>
          </keyword>
